revision.text: Possibly: The Scotch Presbyterian Eloquence; or, the Foolishness of their Teaching discovered from their Books, Sermons and Prayers, And some Remarks on Mr. Rule's Late Vindication of the Kirk, by "Jacob Curate." (Pseudonym for Gilbert Crockatt and John Monroe). 4th ed. (London : Printed for M. Smith in Cornhill, and Sold by the Booksellers of London and Westminster, 1719). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2422383~S1
